rukus.text: 94|1|(he nabee!) kya hamane tumhaare lie tumhaara vaksh (seena) nahin khol diya
94|4|aur tumhaaree charcha ko ooncha kar diya.
94|5|nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai.
94|6|nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai.
94|7|atah, jab avasar mile, jo aaraadhana mein prayaas karo.
94|8|aur apane paalanahaar kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao.
